title: Face Exhaling
description:
A face showing a visible breath of air being dispelled. Used to represent relief, exhaustion, or as a sigh of disappointment or displeasure.

May also be used to indicate the exhaling of smoke.
apple_vendor_description: The face exhaling emoji on Apple devices presents a round, soft-edged face with closed eyes and a gentle, downward-curving mouth, from which a subtle, wispy cloud of breath emanates, rendered with Apple‚Äôs characteristic smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading. The overall visual tone is one of relief, weariness, or release, perfectly capturing the feeling of letting go of tension or stress. It's frequently used on Apple devices to communicate exhaustion, calm, or the end of a challenging situation.
